properties.entry: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATE_DT, BOARD_NO, REPLY.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, PROFILE_IMG, COUNT(BOARD_REPLY_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER ON(REPLY.MEMBER_NO = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN "LIKE" ON(REPLY_NO = BOARD_REPLY_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND REPLY_ST = 'N' GROUP BY REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), BOARD_NO, REPLY.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, PROFILE_IMG ORDER BY REPLY_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" WHERE BOARD_REPLY_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REPLY VALUES( SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?, ?)
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_ST = 'Y' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
